### Exercise 2
```{r}
labs<-200   # The number of labs
N<-matrix(data=NA,nrow=200,ncol=labs)
N[1,]<-rep(x=100,times=labs)     # We begin with 100 test tubes

t<-1  # We set t =1 above
while(any(N[t,]>0)){
  t<-t+1
N[t,]<-rbinom(n=labs,size=N[t-1,],prob=0.95)
}


matplot(N,type='l',lty=1)
```
